class.description: Describes aspects of the link based on the current representation. Possible values are implementation-dependent and should be documented.

title.description: Text describing the nature of a link.

rel.description: Defines the relationship of the link to its entity, per Web Linking (RFC5988).

href.description: The URI of the linked resource.

type.description: Defines media type of the linked resource, per Web Linking (RFC5988).
